content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access Internet Access On-Premises Gateway supports syslog forwarding Zero Trust Secure Access Internet Access On-Premises Gateway now supports forwarding activity logs in the Common Event Format (CEF) to a designated syslog server. For more information, see Deploying an Internet Access On-Premises Gateway.
